mpicxx  -g   CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/layers/cross_entropy.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/layers/linear.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/layers/relu.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/layers/sigmoid.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/layers/softmax.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/ffn.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/matrix.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/test.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/train.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cudaCPU.dir/utils.cpp.o  -o cudaCPU
